div.head: 前後不得溲便
div.div: inability to discharge in front or behind

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Qian hou bu de sou bian

entry.def: inability to discharge in front or behind

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with da xiao bian mi 大小便秘 , stool and urine are blocked. Ru men shi qin 儒門事親 1: 前後不得溲便，宜木通、海金沙、大黃、琥珀、八正散之屬 , “In the case of an inability to discharge in front or behind it is advisable to ingest [medications] such as mu tong , hai jin sha , da huang , hu po , and the ‘powder with eight rectifiers ’”.
